author: jochen.leinberger
title: Open Source Identity Wallet
description: The Cardano Ecosystem is missing an open source wallet which is capable to handle Digital Identities.
solution: Develop an Open Source Wallet which can handle DID's and VC's and provides a reference implementation as a springboard for new Projects.
experience: Software development (Frontend & Backend) & UX Design (20+ years). Plutus Pioneer and Atala Prism Pioneer.
